name: Sombrio Grom's Badass Shorts - Youths
description: Versatile, freeride shorts that take mobility and abrasion resistance seriously. Smart innovations like a DWR coating and knee-pad coverage that doesn't add bulk behind your knee.Fabric is durable 4-way stretch nylon and spandex.DWR finish repels moisture and mud.Bartack stitching throughout stress zones.Adjustable waistband.Locking zip fly with hidden snap and Velcro.Seamless crotch.Front and rear zippered pockets, 1 with lift pass cord.
